card.name: Blade of Regrowth
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent. Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Underfolk Scavenger
card.text: When Underfolk Scavenger enters, create a Map token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Belowborn Lullaby
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand then shuffle. Incantation 4 (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 4 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Rotbound Paladin
card.text: Vigilance When Rotbound Paladin enters, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Tomb Titan
card.text: Trample Whenever Tomb Titan enters or attacks, you may return up to two land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Fleshbind {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains this creature's abilities until end of turn.)

card.name: Covenant Recruiters
card.text: When Covenant Recruiters enters, mill three cards. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. If you don't, create a 1/1 white Human Knight creature token.

card.name: Demon Tamer Morveth
card.text: When Demon Tamer Morveth enters, create Kraghul, a legendary red Demon creature token with "Kraghul's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control." Whenever you would put a land card from anywhere into your hand, put it onto the battlefield instead.

card.name: Luminous Reinforcements
card.text: Create two 1/1 white Human Knight creature tokens. Incantation 3 (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 3 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Ember Rose Pyromancer
card.text: Prowess Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, create a 1/1 blue and red Elemental creature token with prowess.

card.name: Devoted Priests
card.text: When Devoted Priests enters, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. If a card with Incantation was revealed this way gain 2 life. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Grimwoods Hag
card.text: Menace Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card then discard a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Underground Dog Trainer
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a nontoken permanent create a treasure token. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Seasoned Adventurer
card.text: Trample Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Guild's Cartographer
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a map token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Wayfinder's Curiosity
card.text: Creature spells you control can't be countered. Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Black Reliquary Executioner
card.text: Whenever Black Reliquary Executioner or another creature or artifact you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. If that permanent had mana value 1 or less Black Reliquary Executioner gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Boasting Commander
card.text: Vigilance Whenever you cast a spell targeting a creature you control, put a +1/+1 counter on it and gain 1 life.

card.name: Thieving Harpy
card.text: Flying Whenever Thieving Harpy deals combat damage to a player draw a card. Fleshbind {G}{U} ({G}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains this creature's abilities until end of turn.)

card.name: Rite of the Second Oath
card.text: Return all creature cards with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Incantation 3 (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 3 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Big Game Hunt
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to up to one target creature an opponent controls. Create a Map token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Kraghul VTK
card.text: Kraghul's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

card.name: Elemental VTK
card.text: Prowess

card.name: Wrath of the Old Gods
card.text: Destroy all creatures. Incantation 4 (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 4 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Radiant Charge
card.text: Target creature you control gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. If you cast this card from exile, that creature gains trample. Incantation 2 (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 2 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Escaping a Dungeon
card.text: Target creature's owner puts it on their choice of the top or bottom of their library. Create a Map token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Blasphemous Lightning
card.text: Blasphemous Lightning deals 1 damage to you and 2 damage any other target. Incantation 5 (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 5 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Demand Answers
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or discard a card. Draw two cards.

card.name: Fatal Encounter
card.text: Destroy target creature if it has mana value 2 or less. Destroy that creature if it has mana value 4 or less instead if a card left your graveyard this turn.

card.name: Drvog, Hero's Guide
card.text: {T}: Add {G} for each creature you control. At the beginning of your end step, untap Drvog. Until your next turn, it becomes a land.

card.name: Elyndor Dragonrider
card.text: Flying When Elyndor Dragonrider enters, create a Map token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Elyndor Lookout
card.text: When Elyndor Lookout enters, target creature you control explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Corrupted by the Depths
card.text: Target tapped creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

card.name: Bones as Bearings
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature loses all abilities and becomes a colorless artifact Map with: "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as sorcery." (To explore, reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Siege on the Capital
card.text: As this enchantment enters, choose Elyndor or Khar-Duun. • Elyndor — Exile target creature or planeswalker until Siege on the Capital leaves the battlefield. • Khar-Duun — Creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Elyndor Footknight
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Elyndor Footknight becomes a target of a spell or ability you control, it gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Siege on the North Front
card.text: As this enchantment enters, choose Elyndor or Khar-Duun. • Elyndor — Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. • Khar-Duun — Creatures you control have flying.

card.name: Siege on the South Front
card.text: As this enchantment enters, choose Elyndor or Khar-Duun. • Elyndor — At the beginning of your end step, each opponent discards a card. • Khar-Duun — Creatures you control get +X/+0, where x is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

card.name: Siege on the East Front
card.text: As this enchantment enters, choose Elyndor or Khar-Duun. • Elyndor — At the beginning of your upkeep you may discard up to two cards, if you do draw that many cards. • Khar-Duun — Creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Siege on the West Front
card.text: As this enchantment enters, choose Elyndor or Khar-Duun. • Elyndor — Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card. • Khar-Duun — Creatures you control have base power and toughness equal to the half the number of lands you control rounded up.

card.name: Descent of the Radiant
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. Incantation 3 (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 3 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Firebound Oath

card.name: Concord Cavalry

card.name: Incantation of Sacred Flame
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Scry 1. Incantation 3 (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 3 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: The Clattercrew
card.text: As long as The Clattercrew isn't on the battlefield, it's a 1/1 skeleton creature in addition to its other types. [+1]: Mill a card. Create a map token.
